name: Ant Smasher Christmas by BCFG
description:
The best free game out there!

Smash ants with your finger in this great game!

Highly entertaining for kids, boys and girls. Protect your food before the ants and other insects eat it
Keep smashing, ants, spiders, cockroaches and flies. But don’t touch the bee!

Special virtual goods that make the game easier for young players can be acquired!

Features:

+ Several Ants and bugs to Smash
+ One of the best FREE Games ever!
+ Dangerous Bee - Don't Touch the Bee!
+ Global high-score rankings
+ Different Game Modes
+ Best Game for all ages!
+ A funny app to pass the time.

It also helps kids to enhance:
+ Memory
+ Motor skills
+ Focus
+ Cooperation

And it’s a great pastime!

We will keep bringing you the top best games and apps!

Simply touch the ants and relax! Simple, exciting, a must-play arcade game.

Be the best crusher out there!

Download Ant Smasher it's FREE!
